title: Naked on a Treadmill
description: Meet Chris Baine, underachieving corporate drone, whose penchant for gambling has left him swimming in debt. Desperate for an escape, he'll do anything, even if it means losing all sense of decency. Yet to shed the skin of his old life heâ€™ll have to dance with the devil in the form of a sadistic corporate lawyer. And to make matters worse, his cigar loving, lizard-skin-wearing bookie wants his money, or enough flesh to cover the balance due.Will Chris beat the odds to win a bet that promises a chance at living life on his own terms, or will a temping offer from the establishment lure him back to the grind?
author: Paul Lechner
